Tanker Vessel Leasing & Crude /Refined Petroleum Products Trading [Top]

Sequel to the above reference NEPS U.K. Ltd partners with various Ship Management/Brokerage firms in the United Kingdom (UK), Greece, Spain and the USA to provide a wide variety of Tanker Vessels and Barges for either Lightering Operations for Petroleum Product Importers or for other business transactions requiring haulage of Clean (PMS, AGO etc) or Dirty (LPFO etc) Products within the West African Sub-Region.

We also have working relationships with the NNPC Crude Oil Sales Department (COSD) and most NNPC Licensed Crude Oil Traders to provide various specifications of Nigerian Crude for sale on an FOB or CIF Basis.

NEPS Nigeria Ltd also deals with independent Petroleum Marketers and Petroleum Product importers to provide PMS, DPK, AGO ( Nigeria Specification) in Quantities of 2,000 â 15,000 MT at competitive prices.

Solid Minerals Mining, Processing & Allied Services [Top]

NEPS Nigeria LTD is the Owner/operator of Mining Exploration License 2078 & 2079 as granted by the Federal Ministry of Solid Minerals Development (MOSD) covering a Total of 80 Hectares of Land in Guma Local Government of Benue State. We have been given a Contract by OANDO PLC to supply them with 30,000 MT Per Annum of Baryte Ore (Raw Material for Crude Oil Drilling Mud) for their supply to Various Multinationals such as Halliburton, Chevron Shell etc.

We also operate a Baryte Processing Mill at Yandev, Benue State. This Plant Crushes and processes 4,900 MT per Month on behalf of OANDO PLC and other Conglomerates.

Our company also carries out other allied services to the Mining Industry such as

Hiring of Trailers

Laboratory Testing Of Baryte Ore
